summary: The Sandmouse Overhaul is a W.I.P project to overhaul, improve and in some cases radically change many elements in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]W.I.P[/size]
Updates coming soon.[/center]



[size=3]To do list:[/size]

[list]
[*]Complete Smithing and ui menu overhaul for armour and weapons changes.
[*]Complete equiping and style ui menu. (change how you wear that outfit, eg: unzipped, zipped, sleeves roled up, etc.)
[/list]
[b]Armour and clothing:[/b]

[list]
[*]Armour - completely modular, customisable plate, pouldrens, greaves, gauntlets, pads, boots, extra armour, jewels, engraving etc.
[*]Armour and clothing can be crafted from different materials with different textures and in different styles.
[*]Armour and clothes painting/dying.
[*]Layerable armour - cloth + chainmail + plate + cloth/accessories.
[*]Dirt and blood soaked effects.
[*]Armour degradation visual effects.
[*]Aditional armours and accessories.
[/list][list]
[*]HDT equipment - coin purse, rope, skins, potions, tomes, scrolls, chains, etc.
[/list]
[u]Weapons:[/u]

[list]
[*]Weapons - completely modular, customisable hilt, blade, guard, pummel and sheath etc.
[*]Weapons can be crafted from different materials with different textures and in different styles.
[*]Weapon degradation visual effects.
[*]HDT wearable throwing weapons - potions, bombs, grenades, flares, knives, etc.
[/list]
[u]Magic:[/u]

[list]
[*]Fire and ice overhaul. (A beautiful mod that I would like to update/tweak and bring back to the Nexus. (with the original authors permission))
[*]New spells - soul walk, sky drop, storm, earthquake and singularity.
[*]Daughter of Death resurrection mechanics.
[/list]
[u]Dragons:[/u]

[list]
[*]Dragons can die midair and spiral to an explosive death.
[*]Dragon lairs and gold hoards. (atop moutains and in some Dwemer ruins)
[*]Climb on dragons to attack vital areas.
[*]Injured dragons can call other dragons for help.
[/list]
[u]Quests:[/u]

[list]
[*]Help death.
[/list][list]
[*]Alternative start BS-Bruma border crossing quest. (Get arrested for crossing the border into Skyrim)
[/list]
[u]Patches/updates:[/u]

[list]
[*]Immersive armour CBBE HDT meshes and patch. (with original author permission)
[*]BS-bruma CBBE HDT meshes and patch. (with original author permission)
[*]Dwemer tech. (inspired by the Nature of the beast II mod) (with original author permission)
[/list][list]
[*]Immersive currency SkyUI patch and edits. (shows each coin amount by a mini icon in menus) (with original authors permission)
[/list]
[b][u]Other:
[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]Readable grave stones.
[*]SkyTails (HDT hair styles and accessories)
[*]Moving ships and boats.
[*]Priestess/monk improvements.
[*]Slippy ice and ice spike boots.
[*]Breakable and destructable EVERYTHING
[*]SkyFable (Oakwood, Balvorines and Gargoil hunt)
[/list]



Work is ongoing and updates will follow :)
Any suggestions or creative input is most welcomed.
author: Sandmouse Anarchy
